items.title: how to Split data in 3 folds (train,validation,test) using ImageDataGenerator when data is in different directories of each class
items.body:
How do I split my data into 3 folds using ImageDataGenerator of Keras? ImageDataGenerator only gives validation_split argument so if I use it, I wont be having my test set for later purpose.

My data is in the form of

>input_data_dir
 >class_1_dir
  > image_1.png
  > image_2.png
 > class_2_dir
 > class_3_dir
